message:
SYSTEM: SPARQL_optimization_slides.pdf: Página 4
Related Work: SPARQL Optimization
Cost models & selectivities, e.g.
|AG| is cardinality of expression A over graph G
sel(AG) =  |AG|/|G|  is the selectivity of AG
Join expression cardinality:
|AGi·BGj| = |AGi|x|BGj| x min(sel(AGi),sel(BGj)) 
Cost functions
cnested-loop-join(A,B)= |A|·|B|·ccompare
Different estimation methods, cost functions.
See Stocker et al. (2008), Görlitz et al. (2010), Quillitz et al (2008), 
Stuckenschmidt et al (2004)
speaker: SYSTEM
